name: Death around us
description:
• WASD - Move
  • E - Switch weapons
  • Mouse1 - Attack

As time goes on, people get smarter, that's what they think when they decide to cheat death, that's right, humans cheating the order of life law, now they create a society to go against death and live for much longer time, but they don't imagine that death itself will come to claim human souls, because the only certainty we have of life is death.
